name: The Sanctum of Parshath
text: This card's name becomes "The Sanctuary in the Sky" while on the field or in the GY. All Fairy monsters on the field gain 300 ATK/DEF. Set Spells/Traps on the field cannot be destroyed by card effects, also neither player can target them with card effects. Once per turn: You can target 3 Fairy monsters and/or Counter Traps in your GY with different names; place them on top of your Deck in any order.
